item.title: About
item.description:
cydr was originally developed by Jillian Anderson during her undergraduate honors thesis for her Bachelors of Knowledge Integration at the University of Waterloo. This thesis project was completed in April of 2017 under the supervision of Dr. John McLevey.

cydr will continue to be maintained and updated. This maintenance and extension can be followed via cydr’s GitHub page.
